description.ko: 지구 지각에 대한 고해상도 탐사로, 천체적 관점에서 바라본 지각 변동과 풍화된 토양의 거칠고 원초적인 질감에 집중합니다.
description.en: A high-resolution exploration of Earth's crust, focusing on the raw and rugged textures of tectonic shifts and weathered soil from a celestial perspective.

prompt: Ultra-detailed satellite photography of Earth's surface, intricate rocky texture, deep ravines and geological layers, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution, earthy tones, hyper-realistic terrain, desert landscape top-down view.
